message.body: Hey hey, hope rehearsal is going great! Kitty has a new home but they cant take her till Friday- what do you think? I can tell him he has to get her tomorrow but would be easiest Friday. Let me know thoughts. I cant wait to see your show. Xx
Yea, no worries. Thanks for letting me know :)
Thank you and Rey says make sure to say a huge thank you. How was today?
Stressful, which is to be expected. Some of ourÂ production team is sadly under par... But it'll be ok. Did you get your one rehearsal in yet?
Well Im sure it will come together. But I identify w the stress. It'll all be great. Not yet- next week on thurs, ugh our one and only, zoinks.
